description: Try our easy to follow Vietnamese-Style Prawns recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ prawn,Christmas,Prawn,Tree nut free,Egg free,Dairy free
name: Vietnamese-Style Prawns Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine soy sauce, sugar, oil and lime juice in a non-reactive bowl. Add prawns and toss to coat. Set aside for 15 minutes to marinate.
Meanwhile, combine herbs and shallot in a serving bowl and set aside.

To make the chilli dipping sauce, combine 1 1/2 tbs rice vinegar, 1 1/2 tbs lime juice, 1 tbs fish sauce, 1 tbs caster sugar, 1 long red chilli (finely chopped), 1 garlic clove (finely chopped), 2 kaffir lime leaves, finely sliced with 1 tbs water in a bowl. Stir to dissolve sugar and set aside.
Preheat a barbecue grill or chargrill pan on medium-high heat. Remove prawns from marinade and discard marinade. Cook prawns for 2 minutes on each side or until golden. Transfer to a platter.
Serve prawns with lettuce, herb salad, lime wedges and dressing.
